longDesc: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
detailedDesc: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy. The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

longDesc: A drow commoner is here, walking around on guard duty.
detailedDesc: I doubt he is the type to give directions. I doubt he is the type to give directions.

longDesc: A drow warrior stands here guarding his home.
detailedDesc: He looks kind of annoyed! He looks kind of annoyed!

longDesc: A drow mage is here protecting his home.
detailedDesc: The mage prepares to cast a spell... at you!! The mage prepares to cast a spell... at you!!

longDesc: A drow priestess is here shouting orders.
detailedDesc: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side! I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

longDesc: A drow master stares at you angrily.
detailedDesc: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight. The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

longDesc: A drow weaponsmaster is here shadow boxing.
detailedDesc: He definitely know his way around in combat. He definitely know his way around in combat.

longDesc: The Matron Mother of the house is standing here.
detailedDesc: She looks really and truly annoyed that you have found your way here. She looks really and truly annoyed that you have found your way here.

longDesc: The Matron Mother of the first house is waiting for you.
detailedDesc: She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it. She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it.

longDesc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDesc: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent. This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

longDesc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDesc: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent. This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

longDesc: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist...
detailedDesc: The yochlol is not in a good mood. The yochlol is not in a good mood.
